entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Snow level 1000 metres. Fog patches developing overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to 1400 metres in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
